title.rendered: 2022 Spanish Grand Prix Travel Package Rates

content.rendered:
2022 Spanish Grand Prix Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a 2022 Spanish Grand Prix package including four nights accommodation in Barcelona, your choice of premium race viewing, and more. However, we can help you customize your package with additional events and parties, extra nights, private tours, room upgrades, and any other extras that will make your race experience perfect.
Race ViewingPackages From
Premium Grandstand Seating$5,095
Exclusive Hospitality$12,595
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until three months prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
